#setenv script_keepwork true
ucmd godebugtester run -work -srclines=false main.go
#ucmd godebugtester run main.go

#contains stdout "Sleep(\"10ms\"=(10 * \"1ms\"))"
contains stdout "Sleep(10000000=(10 * 1000000))"

-- main.go --
package main
import "fmt"
import "time"
func main(){
	a:=1
	b:=a
	c:="testing"
	go func(){
		u:=a+b
		c+=fmt.Sprintf("%v", u)
	}()
	c+=fmt.Sprintf("%v", a+b)			
	time.Sleep(10*time.Millisecond)
}
